subHeading: Step into an immersive journey, right here at Singapore Polytechnic.
highlightDesc: Experience a preview of our immersive audio tours, designed to guide you through the stories and exhibits of the Singapore Discovery Centre.
beginningsDesc: Discover the origins of Singapore and the pivotal moments that shaped our nation.
supportError: Your browser does not support the audio element.
defendingDesc: Listen to stories of courage and innovation in Singapore's journey to safeguard its future.
voicesDesc: Hear personal accounts and reflections from Singaporeans across generations.
joinSDCCommunity: Join the SDC community and unlock exclusive benefits, discounts, and experiences for you and your family.
discounts: Discounts at SDC cafe & gift shop
annualFamilyBenefits: All annual benefits for up to 5 family members
howAccessAudioTour: How do I access the audio tour?
howAccessAudioTourResponse: You can access the audio tour using your own smartphone and headphones, or borrow a device at the SDC entrance. Simply scan the QR codes at each exhibit to listen.
audioAvaliability: Is the audio tour available in multiple languages?
audioAvaliabilityResponse: Yes, the audio tour is available in English, Mandarin, Malay, and Tamil.
memberToUseAudioTour: Do I need to be a member to use the audio tour?
memberToUseAudioTourResponse: No, all visitors can use the audio tour, but members enjoy complimentary access and additional features.
canIBringFamilyResponse: Absolutely! SDC is family-friendly and offers special family membership plans and activities for all ages.
